reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan lightweight and comfortable, with plenty of room to layer underneath, and appreciate its attractive pattern and versatility for dressing up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and comfy
items.body: Very nice lightweight cardigan. I love it! I got the red elk for Christmas. Can't wait to wear it tomorrow. I am 5'6" and 140 lbs, and I got a medium. It fits nicely, buttons and all, even though I'll leave it open. Usually, I wear a large, and it would have fit too, just a more relaxed fit. The only reason I got the medium is because it was going to get here quickly before Christmas. Read more
items.author: honey bee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Sweater fits true to size. Long enough it covers to the top of my thighs, I’m 5’5”. It’s comfortable and ever so soft. It is on the thinner side. It would be great for spring in Chicago as outerwear or you could use it as a part of your outfit for layering anytime of the year. I will be keeping my eye out for sales on other colors. Love it! Read more
items.author: Chicago

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent sweater lightweight for fall runs big
items.body: I bought this as a Fall seasonal sweater and I was not disappointed with the rust color. It looks sort of Santa Fe or Colorado slightly Western not Christmasy. I do believe that’s a mislabeling. Cons are that it’s a bit expensive for what it is, and is cut wide and boxy. It is bigger / wider than I would like, I normally wear a 2x and I may have ordered a 3x. Cant verify the size while writing the review. I would like it if it had a slightly trimmer fit although I do not like my stuff clothes fitting I do like if it’s slightly narrow at the top than the bottom for a flared look having said that this is a lightweight sweater that’s tan colored on the inside with the print on the outside, but does not look bad just know that it’s stamped on a woven sweater and material but it’s definitely not handwoven and it’s not a thick yarn at all. This is definitely a lightweight fall sweater. In fact, I would not wear this in December at all because I would be freezing and this is California, so I wore this over a sleeveless rose colored top in October and took it off in the afternoon. So the sweater was handy to look professional during the morning meeting and was light enough to to wear in fall when it got warm in the afternoon. I am happy with this purchase, but I do wish I had bought down a size. Read more
items.author: ElleJayBee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Great quality, looks just like the picture, very comfortable and colorful. Read more
items.author: countrygal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wear it regularly. Love it!
items.body: Bought this for work, it's always so cold in the building. It's a nice weight, keeps me warm, feels nice, fits well, and is holding up well with frequent washing. Most importantly, it does not shed! Love this little cardigan. I'm 5'1" about 130 lbs (+/-5 lbs on any given day lol), bought a size small and it fits nicely (I don't button it, but I could and it would still fit). Read more
items.author: bryn40

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, light and a great buy!
items.body: This sweater is light, not for outside cold winters, but beautiful for most other weather or for inside. It is lovely and comfortable. He cost was very reasonable. Pockets are like a bonus! Read more
items.author: Anice Newmark

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater
items.body: Pleasantly surprised with the quality of this sweater. It’s light weight is great for the weather in Louisiana. Colors are very fallish and can be worn with lots of colors. Very pleased with this purchase. No wrinkles right out of the package. Read more
items.author: La Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfortable, good mild weather throw
items.body: This is actually quite cute. I was a little worried it'd look kind of grandma-ish being floral and not on a 20 year old. But, it's cute. It's thin, good for spring/fall. It's soft and doesn't noticeably wrinkle. I have not worn and washed it a lot so can't speak to the longevity. On this "brown pink flower" version, I found that a brown undershirt works best. I tried both pink and blue but those colors were such unique shades that I struggled to find one that worked. A variety of browns would work well. I normally wear a large and a large in this fit. 5'-6 and 200lb. Read more
items.author: KBG

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown Pink Flower, 05 Army Green, Leopard Black, Cashew Brown, 02 Dark Gray, 06 Navy Blue, Cosmos Khaki, Paisley Blue, Rose Red, Christmas Tree Red, Ginkgo Yellow, Round Flower Green, 08 Red, Round Flower Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
